quotes.quote: The inventor of the mirror poisoned the human heart.
The girl in the mirror wasn't who I wanted to be and her life wasn't the one I wanted to have.
I know that mirrors give us a false sense of confidence. I continued. The reflection that we see everyday has nothing to do with how others see us. The glass lies.
Mirror should think longer before they reflect.
Mirrors don't lie. They only show a part of truth. A broken mirror can enlarge a face up to a dimension of a small planet. A problem of reflection? A point of view.
We look into mirrors but we only see the effects of our times on us - not our effects on others.
Everybody else needs mirrors to remind themselves who they are. You're no different.
The mirror reflects all objects without being sullied.
I used to look in the mirror and feel shame, I look in the mirror now and I absolutely love myself.
Look in the mirror, stare back at yourself and if you can't honestly say that you're perfect, then you have a right to judge the person standing beside you.
The world is a great mirror. It reflects back to you what you are.
Whatever may be their use in civilized societies, mirrors are essential to all violent and heroic action.
I leaned over the sink, closer to my reflection, and stare at myself hard. I don't know what I see. I don't even know what I want to see.

Never look down on yourself when the whole world turn against you, just look in the mirror then you'll find out that you're not alone. That person you see in the mirror is your reflection, it shows that even if everybody ignore you it will always stick around with you.
You mirror what the world mirrors to you.
Mirrors are ice which do not melt: what melts are those who admire themselves in them.
When I look in the mirror, I never see a handsome chap or the person people think I am.
I used to live in a room full of mirrors; all I could see was me. I take my spirit and I crash my mirrors, now the whole world is here for me to see.
You can't see the world through a mirror.
Look in the mirror. The face that pins you with its double gaze reveals a chastening secret.
If art reflects life, it does so with special mirrors.
I love mirrors. They let one pass through the surface of things.

The mirror is a powerful tool because it forces you to deal with yourself on a deeper level. Conceptually, paintings are like mirrors. They're an expression from the artist: 'This is how I view the world - I'm presenting it to you.
I love looking in the mirror and feeling good about what I see.
Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
Every man carries with him through life a mirror, as unique and impossible to get rid of as his shadow.
Nobody really knows what they look like. The mirror shows you only what you want to see.
I am locked into the mirror and there is no door out.
Look in a mirror and one thing's sure; what we see is not who we are.
The mirror is my best friend, because when I cry it never laughs.
